channel.title: Client problem help
channel.description:
The first problem i'm having with this client is that when you login, your name is some wierd one. Second, when a character is standing it looks very distorted; when it is running it is gliding.
[img]http://i30.tinypic.com/2hplh4y.jpg[/img]
Also, this isn't my client, a friend sent me and told me to change the ip + recompile so that could be why...? I was wondering if there is a way to hide the IP/port change thingy at login too. Since I don't want my friends knowing the info haha.

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

All you need to do is add the server-side edits (which is literally 2 lines), and the client will work fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @xiphas xiphas
item.description:
@xiphas wrote:

Oh god, this whole time I derived from starting from sratch like this because I thought that I couldn’t do this with a changed port. Haha yeah I am port forwarded fine, and thank you a ton guys for all this help.

Will post back if I have any problems with it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 02:24:51 pm[/size][hr]Alright, another problem kinda like before…

No matter how I edit this line…

            signlink.storeid = Integer.parseInt(args[4]);
            [b]signlink.startpriv(myserver.com);[/b]
            client client1 = new client();
            client1.method1(503, false, 765);

or if I do it with " " tags on it, I get an error saying:

client.java:2512: package deadscape does not exist
signlink.startpriv(myserver.com);

I get a similar error if I use " " saying they shouldn’t be there. Any help?

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Zyle, if its a bluurr client, its GUI.java, not client.java

@xiphas
Any ports should work, as long as they’re configured correctly server + client-sided[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 05:12:11 pm[/size][hr]++ Agreed that bluur fails.
Renamed <33

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“raped by who, post:14, topic:293986”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=388925.msg2906751#msg2906751 date=1249848395]

All i can say is.

player.java.

For christ’s sake, it’s a client problem, NOT a server problem.
[/quote]

Uhm?
To configure bluurrs client to work, you edit player.java IN YOUR SOURCE.

His failed cache is another problem. That does belong in client section.[/quote]

It would be BETTER for him to NOT use a Bluurrs client or derivative from it at all.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 12:11:02 pm[/size][hr]Your server has to be listening to the same port your client is connecting to.

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @xiphas xiphas
item.description:
@xiphas wrote:

Okay, I am not that dense, I have a different port then usual will it still pick it up?

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

In the main method of client.java in the client, you should see something like:

signlink.startpriv("IP here");

Put 127.0.0.1 in the quotes, and make sure your server is running.

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:12, topic:293986”][quote author=raped by who link=topic=388925.msg2906738#msg2906738 date=1249848121]
All i can say is.

player.java.
[/quote]

For christ’s sake, it’s a client problem, NOT a server problem.[/quote]

Uhm?
To configure bluurrs client to work, you edit player.java IN YOUR SOURCE.

His failed cache is another problem. That does belong in client section.

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Actually:

Download a 317 deob -> http://rapidshare.com/files/24714896/RuneScape_317_PRIV.jar.html

Download a blank 377 cache(just erase all the client files, and keep the *cache folder) -> http://www.megaupload.com/?d=44JPTEAY

TO use the 377 cache, replace

0x7a120

with

0xffffff

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @xiphas xiphas
item.description:
@xiphas wrote:

You mean change the client.java and get a new one right? Then get a new cache… Okay, so where do I get a blank 377 cache and what’s a good client.java I could use and easily change a few things in. haha

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Are you all shortbus?

It’s a Bluurrs client, with an edited cache:

Fix:
Change the client
Remove current cache, dowload blank 377 cache.

That’s all you need to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

WRONG SECTION

This is server help, and you need to post in client help.

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @xiphas xiphas
item.description:
@xiphas wrote:

Okay, can anyone tell me where to get the original dds specd client? I tried searching google and the forums for it and it wont turn up.

I looked through all the deobs, can you tell me WHERE to get a different cache haha. I don’t even know where this came from, possibly the client I am already using…

Or, another client that has no toolbar at the top? I tried using the default RS 317 client but I failed to find a cache for it and change the port. =[

Any tips? Oh, my Java skills aren’t as good as my C++ so i am a bit new to this.

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

first off, please get a better cache for it lol, but for the distortedness (?) lol, i would check out the login.java and see if it makes you do an emote when you login or anything like that =P

P.S. for the cache i suggest using 377 for it =]

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

That’s the Bluurrs client. It ONLY works with a bluurrs server, or a server based on bluurrs server. YOu can tell because of the strange name, constant wrong emote, and barb assault for fences. I would sugggest using a different client.

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @xiphas xiphas
item.description:
@xiphas wrote:

Is something wrong with it?

This is a edited version of the dds specd client I believe, I thought that client/server was always the best.

Also, why can’t I use that server?
I believe i’m using this:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,385726.0.html
as a server.

The client should work fine, no?

Oh and I didn’t in anyway mean to say this is my client haha.

PS: Where did the source for DDS SPECd ever go? I know I used to have it a year ago…

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Don’t use Bluurrs client/Server.
